A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The character assassination of Luke was unforgivable. The space chase was boring and unbelievable. Finn and Rose rescued animals but left the slaves behind\, Holdo stayed behind to fly a ship in a straight line.....in space. Reys parents were.....nobody. Snoke was.....nobody. The Knights of Ryn were....nobody. The movie plot holes were LEGION. The film was junk cleverly disguised as a Science Fiction film
